BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
1.0.9.2324 HIGHLIGHT: Read BGL from Sim for ModelGuid FEATURE: *BGL-Reader:* Added a SelectModelGuid-Button for LibraryObjects in Event&Triggers. Just click the "..." Button and load all Models from Official and Community Folder. Double-Click to select one. FEATURE: *Refueling*: Adjust the available airports for refueling to reduce the number. FEATURE: *Refueling*: Added a button to show the airports available for refuel with your settings. FEATURE: *Spb-Decompiler:* Enhanced to decompile VisualEffects Spb files. All stock Spb from Official and Packages folder can be decompiled now! UPDATE: *License-Request:* Added a note, it is not useful to sent multiple requests in a short period. UPDATE: *EULA:* Some adjustments in the EULA for DeepL-API access. UPDATE: *AV-Software:* Optimized whitelisting for several AV-Suites. UPDATE: *Tooltips:* Bring back the lost tooltips on base data. Thanks to 8bitgamerdad. UPDATE: *Internal:* Added a better memory handling in some high memory use areas in the core modules. --- 1.0.8.2290 HIGHLIGHT: Full Automated Translations FEATURE: *Translations:* Use the free-of-charge DeepL-Pro API to create translations. Register for free at DeepL.com and get 500000 chars free each month!
Drop the API Key into Translation Window and translate single entries, the missing or all entries for a single language or for all languages.
Select if you want to translate the names of waypoints. Waypoints starting with WP will not be translated in bulk translation.
Keep in mind, nb-NO is not available on deepl.com. UPDATE: *Flightbook:* Updates the OpenXML Library to the most recent version. UPDATE: *Typos:* Corrected some more... thanks to fsx-rwt UPDATE: *Event&Triggers:* Paste coordinates on LibraryObjects. UPDATE: *Flightsim.to:* Better handling when flightsim.to database is outdated for more than 7 days. UPDATE: *Statusbar:* Don't show multi-line translation issues in statusbar. Thanks to Frontech UPDATE: *Translate-Window:* Prevent closing the window without any entry. BUGFIX: *Translate-Window:* Fixed a issue with a CTD when a LegEndTTS is empty. Thanks to Frontech BUGFIX: *Generation/Translate:* Fixed a CTD when an airport with LegEndTTS is removed from Little Nav Map. BUGFIX: *WorldMap:* Fixed an issue with moving Pins when zooming BUGFIX: *Load Mission*: Fixed an thread synchronization issue that prevents showing same objects in E&T BUGFIX: *Load Mission*: Fixed an issue prevents loading the intro from Little Nav Map. Some beta tester reports issues with GPS/Autopilot on first leg. If you encounter such issues, please report to me. USER-REQ: *Compile:* For better marketplace handling, compile your bush trip into your project folder instead of global package folder. Keep in mind, the project name and output is not changed and you need to do this by yourself. UPDATE: *Database-Viewer:* Show the version of the database and the parking database, if present. UPDATE: *GUI:* A small redesign of data tables in classic theme. UPDATE: *Messages*: Improved several messages to avoid user confusion. UPDATE: *Backup:* Creates a daily backup of bushtripinjector.ini and other saved files in %BTIHOME%\BushTripInjector_SAVES\Backup UPDATE: *Backup:* Change the location for backups of Little Nav Map or BushTripInjector Source files to %BTIHOME%\BushTripInjector_SAVES\Backup BUGFIX: *Scaling/Textscaling:* Fixed an issue when you are using display scaling and in addition a text scaling in windows for some dialogs incl. die License-Key dialog. FEATURE: *Database-Viewer:* Show, sort, filter the BushTripInjector's internal airport, runway and parking database. Show the airports with a single click on the map. UPDATE: *Text-to-speech:* Added online manual content and enabled the *F1*-key function. UPDATE: *Create WAV:* Added online manual content and enabled the *F1*-key function. BUGFIX: *Landmarks:* Removed an unnecessary message when no landmarks are present when loading a mission. --- 1.0.4.2134 HIGHLIGHT: Wikipedia in BaseLanguage, WAV-File Creation from TTS USER-REQ: *Wikipedia Texts from Wikipedia of your base language.* The Wikipedia texts are now determined from the base language set in BushTripInjector. If this is not English (en-GB or en-US), check your Wiki texts. For compatibility reasons, en.wikipedia.org is still the Wikipedia to search, but the local entries linked there will be displayed. If an entry is not available there, the English article will still be used.
If there is an entry in the local Wikipedia that is not available in en.wikipedia.org, fell free to create an article on en.wikipedia.org and set a link to the language wiki. Wikipedia lives from and for everyone and can be maintained by everyone. USER-REQ: *WAV-Files:* Create WAV Files from TTS and Event&Triggers Editor. Select your preferred voice, or let BTI decide by Language, Gender and Age. If you are missing some voices, a step-by-step documentation to activate all windows voices is vailable on Reddit UPDATE: *IngameMarker breaks bush trips:* Unfortunately, ingame markers prevent bush trips from being saved correctly in the simulator at the end of a leg and the trip cannot be continued. A restart from the beginning would be necessary. BTI now issues appropriate warnings and in some cases prevents the creation of ingame markers. * _Apologies to any users affected by this issue for not noticing this during development, alpha or preview testing._* USER-REQ: *Wiki:* Show Wikipedia in your Browser for all available languages from Wiki-Window.
